attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: fuel prices need to be brought down,by reducing the amount of tax on fuel and by working with bp extra to see what you can do together as their profit is blatently high. the cost of fuel currently is really hitting the working class and causing great hardship.this is also affecting business's,the infirmed and young familys who need help and assistance in getting out and about

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
